message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a great product, and I think it's worth a bit more than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure it's worth $130. How about we meet at $110? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, though. How about we meet at $125? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, to be honest. I really want this product, but I'm not willing to pay more than $115. That's my final offer.
I understand you're getting frustrated, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $122? That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm still interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $118. That's as high as I'm willing to go.
I'm starting to get a bit tired of going back and forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $120? That's my final offer.
I'm not willing to pay more than $115. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to buy from John for $100.
